title: Rune pages just got cleared?
body:
So, my I had all 7 available rune pages filled with rune pages for the champions I often play, and I logged into today and they were all cleared. Pretty frustrating having to re do all my rune pages.

Has anybody else had this issue?

replies.body:
I assume that you are talking about the old rune system.
If you know about Runes Reforged, you can reset them again in your new rune pages.
Just in case you don't know, Riot had combined Runes and Masteries into one single system since the 7th of November. 
Its preseason 8 now.

Nope, I had the exact same issue this morning, all of my rune pages (aside from the 5 that Riot gave to us by defeault) were gone and I had to redo them, pretty frustrating stuff{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Then I don't know what is the problem.
